text:
Hello!

I got to know JMeter as a very powerfull tool for loadtesting. So I am using 
JMeter at one of my customers (Roland Rechtsschutz AG, Cologne, Germany) for 
loadtesting and performance monitoring. Roland needed one enhancement: all 
sampleresults had to be stored in a database.

So I've implemented some classes which do the job.

Roland and BEA would like to provide these classes to the JMeter comunity so 
that everyone can use that enhancement.

Since I am very new to JMeter development it would be great if some more 
experienced JMeter developers could take a look at my code and integrate it 
into official JMeter releases.

Please feel free to contact me... I'll help developing that code.

Best Regards
  Thomas

Thomas Keßler
Senior Business Concultant
www.bea.com
creator: tkessler@bea.com

text:
thanks for the contribution, I will try to add it to CVS in 2 weeks. I'm in the
processes of getting 2.1 out. this way, it can go into the next release. my
apologies for not seeing this earlier and forgetting about it.

peter lin
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com

text:
I'm finally working on applying this patch. thanks again for the contribution
and sorry it took us so long to get around to it.

peter lin
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
benoit.wiart@gmail.com
